CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS category (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL, risk_level TEXT NOT NULL, liquidity TEXT NOT NULL)
INSERT: INSERT INTO category (name, risk_level, liquidity) VALUES ($name, $risk_level, $liquidity)
UPDATE: UPDATE category SET name = $name, risk_level = $risk_level, liquidity = $liquidity WHERE id = $id
